subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Tests and Testing
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong and the French anti-doping agency said Armstrong was approached for a hair sample in an unannounced antidoping test Tuesday in southern France, where he is training. Armstrong said it was the 24th antidoping test he had faced since he announced his return in September, and the first time he had been asked to provide a sample of hair. Testing of hair samples is allowed under French law, but is not recognized by the World Anti-Doping Agency or cycling’s governing body, U.C.I.
